lead_paragraph: A tour bus on its way to a ski resort in central Japan slid down a mountainside, killing at least 14 and injuring 27 others, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Bus Crash in Japan Kills at Least 14
headline.main: Bus Crash in Japan Kills at Least 14

snippet: A tour bus on its way to a ski resort in central Japan slid down a mountainside, killing at least 14 and injuring 27 others, officials said.
abstract: Fourteen passengers are killed when tour bus bound for ski resort in central Japan crashes, latest in series of bus accidents some attribute to drivers' harsh working conditions.
